verses.verse: And Abimelech <WH40> the son <WH1121> of Jerubbaal <WH3378> went <WH1980> to Shechem <WH7927> unto <WH413> his mother's <WH517> brethren, <WH251> and communed <WH1696> with <WH413> them, and with <WH413> all <WH3605> the family <WH4940> of the house <WH1004> of his mother's <WH517> father, <WH1> saying, <WH559>

Speak, <WH1696> I pray you, <WH4994> in the ears <WH241> of all <WH3605> the men <WH1167> of Shechem, <WH7927> Whether <WH4100> is better <WH2896> for you, either that all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Jerubbaal, <WH3378> which are threescore and ten <WH7657> persons, <WH376> reign <WH4910> over you, or <WH518> that one <WH259> reign <WH4910> over you? remember <WH2142> also that <WH3588> I <WH589> am your bone <WH6106> and your flesh. <WH1320>

And his mother's <WH517> brethren <WH251> spoke <WH1696> of <WH5921> him in the ears <WH241> of all <WH3605> the men <WH1167> of Shechem <WH7927> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words: <WH1697> and their hearts <WH3820> inclined to follow <WH5186> <WH310> Abimelech; <WH40> for <WH3588> they said, <WH559> He <WH1931> is our brother. <WH251>

And they gave <WH5414> him threescore and ten <WH7657> pieces of silver <WH3701> out of the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of Baal-berith, <WH1170> wherewith Abimelech <WH40> hired <WH7936> vain <WH7386> and light <WH6348> persons, <WH376> which followed <WH1980> <WH310> him.

And he went <WH935> unto his father's <WH1> house <WH1004> at Ophrah, <WH6084> and slew <WH2026> <WH853> his brethren <WH251> the sons <WH1121> of Jerubbaal, <WH3378> being threescore and ten <WH7657> persons, <WH376> upon <WH5921> one <WH259> stone: <WH68> notwithstanding yet Jotham <WH3147> the youngest <WH6996> son <WH1121> of Jerubbaal <WH3378> was left; <WH3498> for <WH3588> he hid himself. <WH2244>

And all <WH3605> the men <WH1167> of Shechem <WH7927> gathered together, <WH622> and all <WH3605> the house of Millo, <WH1037> and went, <WH1980> and made <WH4427> <WH853> Abimelech <WH40> king, <WH4428> by <WH5973> the plain <WH436> of the pillar <WH5324> that <WH834> was in Shechem. <WH7927>

And when they told <WH5046> it to Jotham, <WH3147> he went <WH1980> and stood <WH5975> in the top <WH7218> of mount <WH2022> Gerizim, <WH1630> and lifted up <WH5375> his voice, <WH6963> and cried, <WH7121> and said <WH559> unto them, Hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> me, ye men <WH1167> of Shechem, <WH7927> that God <WH430> may hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> you.

The trees <WH6086> went forth <WH1980> <WH1980> on a time to anoint <WH4886> a king <WH4428> over <WH5921> them; and they said <WH559> unto the olive tree, <WH2132> Reign <WH4427> thou over <WH5921> us.

But the olive tree <WH2132> said <WH559> unto them, Should I leave <WH2308> <WH853> my fatness, <WH1880> wherewith <WH834> by me they honor <WH3513> God <WH430> and man, <WH376> and go <WH1980> to be promoted <WH5128> over <WH5921> the trees? <WH6086>
And the trees <WH6086> said <WH559> to the fig tree, <WH8384> Come <WH1980> thou, <WH859> and reign <WH4427> over <WH5921> us.

But the fig tree <WH8384> said <WH559> unto them, Should I forsake <WH2308> <WH853> my sweetness, <WH4987> and my good <WH2896> fruit, <WH8570> and go <WH1980> to be promoted <WH5128> over <WH5921> the trees? <WH6086>
Then said <WH559> the trees <WH6086> unto the vine, <WH1612> Come <WH1980> thou, <WH859> and reign <WH4427> over <WH5921> us.

And the vine <WH1612> said <WH559> unto them, Should I leave <WH2308> <WH853> my wine, <WH8492> which cheereth <WH8055> God <WH430> and man, <WH376> and go <WH1980> to be promoted <WH5128> over <WH5921> the trees? <WH6086>
Then said <WH559> all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> unto <WH413> the bramble, <WH329> Come <WH1980> thou, <WH859> and reign <WH4427> over <WH5921> us.

And the bramble <WH329> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the trees, <WH6086> If <WH518> in truth <WH571> ye <WH859> anoint <WH4886> me king <WH4428> over <WH5921> you, then come <WH935> and put your trust <WH2620> in my shadow: <WH6738> and if <WH518> not, <WH369> let fire <WH784> come out <WH3318> of <WH4480> the bramble, <WH329> and devour <WH398> <WH853> the cedars <WH730> of Lebanon. <WH3844>

Now <WH6258> therefore, if <WH518> ye have done <WH6213> truly <WH571> and sincerely, <WH8549> in that ye have made Abimelech king, <WH4427> <WH853> <WH40> and if <WH518> ye have dealt <WH6213> well <WH2896> with <WH5973> Jerubbaal <WH3378> and his house, <WH1004> and have done <WH6213> unto him according to the deserving <WH1576> of his hands; <WH3027>

(For <WH834> my father <WH1> fought <WH3898> for <WH5921> you, and adventured <WH7993> <WH853> his life <WH5315> far, <WH4480> <WH5048> and delivered <WH5337> you out of the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of Midian: <WH4080>

And ye <WH859> are risen up <WH6965> against <WH5921> my father's <WH1> house <WH1004> this day, <WH3117> and have slain <WH2026> <WH853> his sons, <WH1121> threescore and ten <WH7657> persons, <WH376> upon <WH5921> one <WH259> stone, <WH68> and have made <WH853> Abimelech, <WH40> the son <WH1121> of his maidservant, <WH519> king <WH4427> over <WH5921> the men <WH1167> of Shechem, <WH7927> because <WH3588> he <WH1931> is your brother;) <WH251>

If <WH518> ye then have dealt <WH6213> truly <WH571> and sincerely <WH8549> with <WH5973> Jerubbaal <WH3378> and with <WH5973> his house <WH1004> this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> then rejoice <WH8055> ye in Abimelech, <WH40> and let him <WH1931> also <WH1571> rejoice <WH8055> in you:

But if <WH518> not, <WH369> let fire <WH784> come out <WH3318> from Abimelech, <WH4480> <WH40> and devour <WH398> <WH853> the men <WH1167> of Shechem, <WH7927> and the house <WH1004> of Millo; <WH4407> and let fire <WH784> come out <WH3318> from the men <WH4480> <WH1167> of Shechem, <WH7927> and from the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of Millo, <WH4407> and devour <WH398> <WH853> Abimelech. <WH40>
And Jotham <WH3147> ran away, <WH5127> and fled, <WH1272> and went <WH1980> to Beer, <WH876> and dwelt <WH3427> there, <WH8033> for fear <WH4480> <WH6440> of Abimelech <WH40> his brother. <WH251>
When Abimelech <WH40> had reigned <WH7786> three <WH7969> years <WH8141> over <WH5921> Israel, <WH3478>

Then God <WH430> sent <WH7971> an evil <WH7451> spirit <WH7307> between <WH996> Abimelech <WH40> and the men <WH1167> of Shechem; <WH7927> and the men <WH1167> of Shechem <WH7927> dealt treacherously <WH898> with Abimelech: <WH40>

That the cruelty <WH2555> done to the threescore and ten <WH7657> sons <WH1121> of Jerubbaal <WH3378> might come, <WH935> and their blood <WH1818> be laid <WH7760> upon <WH5921> Abimelech <WH40> their brother, <WH251> which <WH834> slew <WH2026> them; and upon <WH5921> the men <WH1167> of Shechem, <WH7927> which <WH834> aided <WH2388> <WH853> <WH3027> him in the killing <WH2026> of <WH853> his brethren. <WH251>

And the men <WH1167> of Shechem <WH7927> set <WH7760> liers in wait <WH693> for him in <WH5921> the top <WH7218> of the mountains, <WH2022> and they robbed <WH1497> <WH853> all <WH3605> that <WH834> came along <WH5674> that way <WH1870> by <WH5921> them: and it was told <WH5046> Abimelech. <WH40>

And Gaal <WH1603> the son <WH1121> of Ebed <WH5651> came <WH935> with his brethren, <WH251> and went over <WH5674> to Shechem: <WH7927> and the men <WH1167> of Shechem <WH7927> put their confidence <WH982> in him.

And they went out <WH3318> into the fields, <WH7704> and gathered <WH1219> <WH853> their vineyards, <WH3754> and trod <WH1869> the grapes, and made <WH6213> merry, <WH1974> and went into <WH935> the house <WH1004> of their god, <WH430> and did eat <WH398> and drink, <WH8354> and cursed <WH7043> <WH853> Abimelech. <WH40>

And Gaal <WH1603> the son <WH1121> of Ebed <WH5651> said, <WH559> Who <WH4310> is Abimelech, <WH40> and who <WH4310> is Shechem, <WH7927> that <WH3588> we should serve <WH5647> him? is not <WH3808> he the son <WH1121> of Jerubbaal? <WH3378> and Zebul <WH2083> his officer? <WH6496> serve <WH5647> <WH853> the men <WH376> of Hamor <WH2544> the father <WH1> of Shechem: <WH7928> for why <WH4069> should we <WH587> serve <WH5647> him?

And would to God <WH4310> <WH5414> <WH853> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> were under my hand! <WH3027> then would I remove <WH5493> <WH853> Abimelech. <WH40> And he said <WH559> to Abimelech, <WH40> Increase <WH7235> thine army, <WH6635> and come out. <WH3318>
And when Zebul <WH2083> the ruler <WH8269> of the city <WH5892> heard <WH8085> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of Gaal <WH1603> the son <WH1121> of Ebed, <WH5651> his anger <WH639> was kindled. <WH2734>

And he sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> unto <WH413> Abimelech <WH40> privily, <WH8649> saying, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> Gaal <WH1603> the son <WH1121> of Ebed <WH5651> and his brethren <WH251> be come <WH935> to Shechem; <WH7927> and, behold, <WH2009> they fortify <WH6696> <WH853> the city <WH5892> against <WH5921> thee.
Now <WH6258> therefore up <WH6965> by night, <WH3915> thou <WH859> and the people <WH5971> that <WH834> is with <WH854> thee, and lie in wait <WH693> in the field: <WH7704>

And it shall be, <WH1961> that in the morning, <WH1242> as soon as the sun <WH8121> is up, <WH2224> thou shalt rise early, <WH7925> and set <WH6584> upon <WH5921> the city: <WH5892> and, behold, <WH2009> when he <WH1931> and the people <WH5971> that <WH834> is with <WH854> him come out <WH3318> against <WH413> thee, then mayest thou do <WH6213> to them as <WH834> thou shalt find <WH4672> occasion. <WH3027>

And Abimelech <WH40> rose up, <WH6965> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were with <WH5973> him, by night, <WH3915> and they laid wait <WH693> against <WH5921> Shechem <WH7927> in four <WH702> companies. <WH7218>

And Gaal <WH1603> the son <WH1121> of Ebed <WH5651> went out, <WH3318> and stood <WH5975> in the entering <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> of the city: <WH5892> and Abimelech <WH40> rose up, <WH6965> and the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were with <WH854> him, from <WH4480> lying in wait. <WH3993>

And when Gaal <WH1603> saw <WH7200> <WH853> the people, <WH5971> he said <WH559> to <WH413> Zebul, <WH2083> Behold, <WH2009> there come people down <WH3381> <WH5971> from the top <WH4480> <WH7218> of the mountains. <WH2022> And Zebul <WH2083> said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Thou <WH859> seest <WH7200> <WH853> the shadow <WH6738> of the mountains <WH2022> as if they were men. <WH376>

And Gaal <WH1603> spoke <WH1696> again <WH3254> and said, <WH559> See <WH2009> there come people down <WH3381> <WH5971> by <WH4480> <WH5973> the middle <WH2872> of the land, <WH776> and another <WH259> company <WH7218> come <WH935> along by <WH4480> <WH5973> the plain <WH436> of Meonenim. <WH6049>

Then said <WH559> Zebul <WH2083> unto <WH413> him, Where <WH346> is now <WH645> thy mouth, <WH6310> wherewith <WH834> thou saidst, <WH559> Who <WH4310> is Abimelech, <WH40> that <WH3588> we should serve <WH5647> him? is not <WH3808> this <WH2088> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> thou hast despised? <WH3988> go out, <WH3318> I pray <WH4994> now, <WH6258> and fight <WH3898> with them.
And Gaal <WH1603> went out <WH3318> before <WH6440> the men <WH1167> of Shechem, <WH7927> and fought <WH3898> with Abimelech. <WH40>

And Abimelech <WH40> chased <WH7291> him, and he fled <WH5127> before <WH4480> <WH6440> him, and many <WH7227> were overthrown <WH5307> and wounded, <WH2491> even unto <WH5704> the entering <WH6607> of the gate. <WH8179>

And Abimelech <WH40> dwelt <WH3427> at Arumah: <WH725> and Zebul <WH2083> thrust out <WH1644> <WH853> Gaal <WH1603> and his brethren, <WH251> that they should not dwell <WH4480> <WH3427> in Shechem. <WH7927>
And it came to pass <WH1961> on the morrow, <WH4480> <WH4283> that the people <WH5971> went out <WH3318> into the field; <WH7704> and they told <WH5046> Abimelech. <WH40>

And he took <WH3947> <WH853> the people, <WH5971> and divided <WH2673> them into three <WH7969> companies, <WH7218> and laid wait <WH693> in the field, <WH7704> and looked, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> the people <WH5971> were come forth <WH3318> out of <WH4480> the city; <WH5892> and he rose up <WH6965> against <WH5921> them, and smote <WH5221> them.

And Abimelech, <WH40> and the company <WH7218> that <WH834> was with <WH5973> him, rushed forward, <WH6584> and stood <WH5975> in the entering <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> of the city: <WH5892> and the two <WH8147> other companies <WH7218> ran <WH6584> upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> the people that <WH834> were in the fields, <WH7704> and slew <WH5221> them.

And Abimelech <WH40> fought <WH3898> against the city <WH5892> all <WH3605> that <WH1931> day; <WH3117> and he took <WH3920> <WH853> the city, <WH5892> and slew <WH2026> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> was therein, and beat down <WH5422> <WH853> the city, <WH5892> and sowed <WH2232> it with salt. <WH4417>

And when all <WH3605> the men <WH1167> of the tower <WH4026> of Shechem <WH7927> heard <WH8085> that, they entered <WH935> into <WH413> a hold <WH6877> of the house <WH1004> of the god <WH410> Berith. <WH1286>
And it was told <WH5046> Abimelech, <WH40> that <WH3588> all <WH3605> the men <WH1167> of the tower <WH4026> of Shechem <WH7927> were gathered together. <WH6908>

And Abimelech <WH40> got him up <WH5927> to mount <WH2022> Zalmon, <WH6756> he <WH1931> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were with <WH854> him; and Abimelech <WH40> took <WH3947> <WH853> an axe <WH7134> in his hand, <WH3027> and cut down <WH3772> a bough <WH7754> from the trees, <WH6086> and took <WH5375> it, and laid <WH7760> it on <WH5921> his shoulder, <WH7926> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were with <WH5973> him, What <WH4100> ye have seen <WH7200> me do, <WH6213> make haste, <WH4116> and do <WH6213> as I <WH3644> have done.

And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> likewise <WH1571> cut down <WH3772> every man <WH376> his bough, <WH7754> and followed <WH1980> <WH310> Abimelech, <WH40> and put <WH7760> them to <WH5921> the hold, <WH6877> and set <WH3341> <WH853> the hold <WH6877> on fire <WH784> upon <WH5921> them; so that all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of the tower <WH4026> of Shechem <WH7927> died <WH4191> also, <WH1571> about a thousand <WH505> men <WH376> and women. <WH802>
Then went <WH1980> Abimelech <WH40> to <WH413> Thebez, <WH8405> and encamped <WH2583> against Thebez, <WH8405> and took <WH3920> it.

But there was <WH1961> a strong <WH5797> tower <WH4026> within <WH8432> the city, <WH5892> and thither <WH8033> fled <WH5127> all <WH3605> the men <WH376> and women, <WH802> and all <WH3605> they <WH1167> of the city, <WH5892> and shut <WH5462> it to <WH1157> them, and got them up <WH5927> to <WH5921> the top <WH1406> of the tower. <WH4026>

And Abimelech <WH40> came <WH935> unto <WH5704> the tower, <WH4026> and fought <WH3898> against it, and went hard <WH5066> unto <WH5704> the door <WH6607> of the tower <WH4026> to burn <WH8313> it with fire. <WH784>
And a certain <WH259> woman <WH802> cast <WH7993> a piece <WH6400> of a millstone <WH7393> upon <WH5921> Abimelech's <WH40> head, <WH7218> and all to broke <WH7533> <WH853> his skull. <WH1538>

Then he called <WH7121> hastily <WH4120> unto <WH413> the young man <WH5288> his armorbearer, <WH5375> <WH3627> and said <WH559> unto him, Draw <WH8025> thy sword, <WH2719> and slay <WH4191> me, that <WH6435> men say <WH559> not of me, A woman <WH802> slew <WH2026> him. And his young man <WH5288> thrust him through, <WH1856> and he died. <WH4191>
And when the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> Abimelech <WH40> was dead, <WH4191> they departed <WH1980> every man <WH376> unto his place. <WH4725>

Thus God <WH430> rendered <WH7725> <WH853> the wickedness <WH7451> of Abimelech, <WH40> which <WH834> he did <WH6213> unto his father, <WH1> in slaying <WH2026> <WH853> his seventy <WH7657> brethren: <WH251>

And all <WH3605> the evil <WH7451> of the men <WH376> of Shechem <WH7927> did God <WH430> render <WH7725> upon their heads: <WH7218> and upon <WH413> them came <WH935> the curse <WH7045> of Jotham <WH3147> the son <WH1121> of Jerubbaal. <WH3378>
